name: Devouring Angel
description: A large aberration with quasi-wings and a twisted form, covered in acid-coated spines, capable of contorting its body.
memorable: Its ability to unleash acid-coated spines in area damage and grapple targets with a spiked tongue makes it particularly dangerous.
goals: Typically engages in combat to overpower its foes and devour them with its attacks.
relations: May be found in the company of other aberrations or in conflict with celestial beings.
environment: Often encountered in dark, twisted environments or areas with unsettlingly magical influences.
strengths: High hit points combined with the ability to deal substantial damage both in melee and with area attacks.
weaknesses: Low intelligence limits strategic planning in combat scenarios.
attacks: Multiattack consisting of a bite that deals piercing and acid damage, and claws that deal slashing damage; also has a tongue attack that grapples and restrains.
most_powerful_ability: Shed Spines allows it to deal significant area damage with piercing and acid effects.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 120 feet, enhancing its awareness of surroundings despite being blind.
skills: Has a passive perception of 17, aided by keen smell granting advantage on perception checks involving smell.
additional_information: Immunities to conditions like blinded, charmed, and frightened.
Limited telepathy allows it to communicate within a short range.
Can fly short distances thanks to its Assisted Leaping ability.
Flexible Form ability lets it pass through tight spaces.
Strong physical attributes enhance its durability and offensive capabilities.
test_queries: monster that grapples and restrains targets
powerful melee attacker with high hit points
